description:
Console information:


root@marek-node:~# openstack server create --flavor m1.nano --image cirros \
>   --nic net-id=fbe93749-b339-4251-b5f1-43d71def4b31 --security-group default \
>   --key-name mykey provider-instance
Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<class 'neutronclient.common.exceptions.Unauthorized'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-c868de34-64b6-4c03-a1b7-ebaa21ae2585)
root@marek-node:~# http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/


nova-api log: http://pastebin.com/Pff7rYX4

2 nodes, Ubuntu 16.04LTS.
title: creating new flavor bug
